descriptionHtml:
[center][i][font=Courier New][size=5][b][/b]


This is a preset

[/size][/font][/i][/center]

[size=2][font=Courier New]If you have questions I will answer them just leave a comment i'll check that out. If you don't like the mod it's your choice, leaving is probably the best thing to do.[/font]

[font=Courier New]-sorry for my bad english, it is not my native language.[/font]






[u][font=Comic Sans MS]*The images may shock some people*



[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/18/1430118018-enb2015-4-27-6-41-45.jpg[/img]
[/font][/u][/size]




[size=5][font=Courier New][center][u]Installation[/u][/center][/font]



[/size][size=2]
[font=Courier New]1. You will need to install BodySlide from Caliente
2. Place the file in the 'SliderPresets' folder - Path: (Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data/CalienteTools/Bodyslide/SliderPresets)
3. Open BodySlide and choose the new preset.
4. When you are done, click 'Build'
5. Finish. You can now open the game.
[/font][/size]





[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/17/1429932566-funny.jpg[/img]

[font=Courier New][size=5][center]

Credits[/center][/size][/font]



[font=Courier New][size=2]Armors : Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT by ChronoTrigger77
Skin : CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096 by AnTiWoMaAgNoT
Body : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Hair : ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
Eyes : The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
ENB : Stakado Cinemascope ENB - Near to zero performance loss by Stakado

The skin may look different because I used Photoshop but i'm sure the original one will be a better choice for most people.
[/size][/font]






[img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/17/1429933654--.jpg[/img]
author: Jorge575S
